duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and ensure compliance with all GAAP, FASB, and IRS rules and regulations.
Manage routine accounting functions such as Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, and Revenue Recognition.
Balance rental operating system, fleet operating system, and accounting system for month-end process.
Ensure cash balances for multiple bank accounts and prepare and process monthly billing and payments for customers.
Manage fleet inventory, sales of vehicles, collision/insurance claims, and OEMs incentive payments.
Assist in audit support, tax compliance, and financial systems oversight.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a business discipline (Accounting or Finance preferred)
Supervisory experience in a similar role.
Experience working in a large-scale ERP environment, preferably Intacct.
